verses.name: Ezekiel 8:7
verses.text: And he brought me to the door of the court; and when I looked, behold a hole in the wall.

verses.name: Ezekiel 8:8
verses.text: Then said he unto me, Son of man, dig now in the wall: and when I had digged in the wall, behold a door.

verses.name: Ezekiel 8:9
verses.text: And he said unto me, Go in, and behold the wicked abominations that they do here.

verses.name: Ezekiel 8:10
verses.text: So I went in and saw; and behold every form of creeping things, and abominable beasts, and all the idols of the house of Israel, pourtrayed upon the wall round about.
